'''Netherite nautilus armor''' is a rare type of [[nautilus armor]] that can be equipped by a [[nautilus]] that reduces the damage received to the nautilus. It is obtained by upgrading a [[diamond nautilus armor]] using a [[netherite ingot]] and [[netherite upgrade]] at a [[smithing table]]. It is the strongest [[tier]] of nautilus armor, having higher armor points and armor toughness than diamond nautilus armor.

== Obtaining ==
=== Upgrading ===
{{Smithing|showdescription=1|Netherite Upgrade|Diamond Nautilus Armor|Netherite Ingot|Netherite Nautilus Armor}}

== Usage ==
=== Equipping ===
Netherite nautilus armor can be equipped on a [[tame]]d [[nautilus]] by holding the nautilus armor and using the {{Control|use|text=use button}} on a nautilus. It is also able to be equipped manually by putting it into the nautilus armor slot through mounting the nautilus and using its {{control|inventory}} control, or by {{control|sneaking}} and then {{control|using}} or pressing the "open inventory" button.{{only|bedrock}}

Baby nautiluses are unable to equip nautilus armor as they are not rideable.

=== Protection ===
When equipped, netherite nautilus armor gives {{Armor|19}} [[armor points]], {{Armor|3}} [[armor toughness]] and 1 (10%) [[knockback resistance]].
